overview:
Itai brings extensive managerial experience in all aspect of product,marketing and business development in global companies in the online media industry.

In 2006 Itai graduated his L.L.B with Extended Complementary Studies in Management from the Tel Aviv university. Soon thereafter he did his lawyers apprenticeship at Sahar, Stobiecki & Co. where he specialized in corporate law, M&A’s and representing international companies.

After joining the Israeli lawyers bar association in 2007 Itai Decided to embark on a new way and took a leading position with Egloo Media- A start up company which developed and launched a cellular oriented UGC website called thecellfrek.com.

Following the successful launch of thecellfreak Itai served in various positions in Logia Group, where he led the international online internet activity and served as VP Business Development.

Since early 2011 Itai has consulted to various startup companies and took a leading role in zeZebra- an online large files transfer solution.

Itai is currently working on a new start up called FoodSteps- A Step by Step Social Recipes platform for Tablets.
